name: The Siege (Wheezy.Media)
description:
Hello there!

First of all, this is more of a concept/demo/prototype than a game at this early stage. Unfortunately, most of the game got scrapped for personnal reasons (and also a lack of time). Being my first project in GDevelop (well actually second, I did make a game 6 years ago using this engine!) I had to learn the quirks of the engine pretty much on the spot. Even tho most of the "game" got scrapped, with lots of bugs present, I did have alot of fun playing around with the engine! GDevelop has alot of potential and I cannot wait to see what's coming next!
